boardgraphics

Interface Drawable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoardOutline, ComponentObstacleArea, ComponentOutline, ConductionArea, DrillItem, Item, ObstacleArea, Pin, PolylineTrace, Trace, Via, ViaObstacleArea

    public interface Drawable
    items to be drawn by the functions in GraphicsContext must implement this interface
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static int MAX_DRAW_PRIORITY

      static int MIDDLE_DRAW_PRIORITY
      Constant MIDDLE_DRAW_PRIORITY=3
      static int MIN_DRAW_PRIORITY
      Constant MIN_DRAW_PRIORITY=1

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        void draw(java.awt.Graphics p_g,
          GraphicsContext p_graphics_context,
          java.awt.Color[] p_color_arr,
          double p_intensity)
        Draws this item to the device provided in p_graphics_context. p_color_arr is an array of dimenssion layer_count. p_intensity is a number between between 0 and 1.
        Parameters:
        p_g - a Graphics object.
        p_graphics_context - a GraphicsContext object.
        p_graphics_context - a GraphicsContext object.
        p_color_arr - an array of Color objects.
        p_intensity - a double.

      • draw

        void draw(java.awt.Graphics p_g,
          GraphicsContext p_graphics_context,
          java.awt.Color p_color,
          double p_intensity)
        Draws this item to the device provided in p_graphics_context. It is drawn on each layer with the same color p_color. p_intensity is a number between 0 and 1.
        Parameters:
        p_g - a Graphics object.
        p_graphics_context - a GraphicsContext object.
        p_graphics_context - a GraphicsContext object.
        p_color - a Color object.
        p_intensity - a double.

      • get_draw_priority

        int get_draw_priority()
        Returns the priority for drawing an item. Items with higher priority are drawn later than items with lower priority.
        Returns:
        a int.

      • get_draw_intensity

        double get_draw_intensity(GraphicsContext p_graphics_context)
        Gets the drawing intensity in the alpha blending for this item.
        Parameters:
        p_graphics_context - a GraphicsContext object.
        Returns:
        a double.

      • get_draw_colors

        java.awt.Color[] get_draw_colors(GraphicsContext p_graphics_context)
        gets the draw colors for this object from p_graphics_context
        Parameters:
        p_graphics_context - a GraphicsContext object.
        Returns:
        an array of Color objects.
